Configuration.Name: Alma-Digitization Addon
Configuration.Author: Collin Molony
Configuration.Description: Submits a digitization request to an institution's Alma using the Users and Fulfillment API.

Setting.name: AutoSearch
Setting.Description: Determines whether or not the search should be done automatically when the request is opened.

Setting.name: regionalURL
Setting.Description: Alma API Regional URL. Sourced from table: https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/#calling

Setting.name: SubmissionURL
Setting.Description: URL for website to handle request submissions (see web setup instructions)

Setting.name: UserId
Setting.Description: Alma Primary ID for ILL lending patron in Alma (the patron which will receive all of the requests).
